instructions: Change the height of the white stripe from 19 pixels to 17 pixels:  `rect(0, 202, 174, 17);` (also adjust the y coordinate slightly for better alignment).
Move the red stripe down by 2 pixels: `rect(174, 232, 87, 17);`
Increase the height of the white rectangle on the right by 20 pixels: `rect(174, 0, 87, 267);`
